Method(s)/Technology(ies): Mechanical initial specimen diversion and sequestration
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Steripath Micro Blood Collection System, a mechanical blood specimen collection device with diversion feature to reduce blood culture contamination.
Indications for Use Summary: Indicated for blood collection for in vitro diagnostic testing, diverts and sequesters initial specimen prior to subsequent sample to reduce frequency of blood culture contamination compared to standard procedure without manual diversion; some components may be used for infusion after sample collection.
